description.value:
When you select this option, you can choose one of the following class features.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.B1ejOuW4Xox9yU5w]{Archer Fighting Style (Hybrid)}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.VHJMpK1iqECseN8k]{Beast Mastery (Hybrid)}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.FmkhHVAY6WNS4K2d]{Hunter Fighting Style (Hybrid)}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.LMsgEkhOXlfatdi1]{Marauder Fighting Style (Hybrid)}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.Item.Jg3sjotopoxOgj3R]{Two-Blade Fighting Style (Hybrid)}

Published in Player's Handbook 3.
